channel.title: CVE Feed for adreastrian -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for adreastrian -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-8288|2024-10-01T13:47:39.023Z -- adreastrian -- guten%20post%20layout%20%E2%80%93%20an%20advanced%20post%20grid%20collection%20for%20wordpress%20gutenberg
item.description: The Guten Post Layout – An Advanced Post Grid Collection for WordPress Gutenberg plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘align’ attribute within the 'wp:guten-post-layout/post-grid' Gutenberg block in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-8288|2024-10-01T08:30:15.453Z -- adreastrian -- guten%20post%20layout%20%E2%80%93%20an%20advanced%20post%20grid%20collection%20for%20wordpress%20gutenberg
item.description: The Guten Post Layout – An Advanced Post Grid Collection for WordPress Gutenberg plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the ‘align’ attribute within the 'wp:guten-post-layout/post-grid' Gutenberg block in all versions up to, and including, 1.2.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
